name: ReDevil
description:
Yurei City, from a first glance all anyone would be able to see is a regular urban city.  Tall buildings point toward the sky, advertisements take up all the video screens, and civilians live out their day to day lives.  However the grim reality of this city begins once the city wide curfew begins.  Everyone in the city takes shelter as an event called Omagatoki begins.  Yokai begin roaming the streets of Yurei City, killing anyone in their sight.  

Red, one of the top ranked Yokai Hunters of Yurei City, works to protect the city from the nightly yokai invasions.  When the strange appearance of multiple high level threat yokai appear all at once, it is up to Red to discover what grim truth Yurei City’s nightly horrors hides.

Fly around the stage with your dash and slash your way through all the yokai in your path in this fast paced, 2D Side Scrolling Action Game!
